title: How would you write a short paragraph on 'Life is a struggle'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d create one sentence to present my thesis. Then, I’d create six or seven sentences that either explain that thesis or provide examples of struggles, or which present arguments in favor of life being a struggle. Suppose I went up to you and asked, “Why do you think life is a struggle? How or in what ways?” What would you tell me? Take whatever you would tell me verbally, then write it down. Then go back and polish it for formal tone and proofread. You may be making this task harder than it needs to be.
